titles: By the Quene although the Quenes most excellent Maiestie myght accordyng to the good example of good and wyse prynces, leuie great sommes of money at this presente, by due execution of sundrye wholsome lawes, upon great nombre of her subiectes for transgressyng the same ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
publisher: By Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: Page 1 line one ends "accordyng ... exam-"; page 2 includes colophon.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
